definitions.definition: The state or measure of being clear , either in appearance , thought or style ; lucidity .
examples: The brilliant clarity of his argument could not be faulted.

definitions.definition: The ability to be easily understood.
examples: Lack of clarity on the part of the teacher will cause confusion among the students.

definitions.definition: The ability to think clearly and rationally.
The ability to be easily heard.
examples: The singer was praised for the amazing clarity in her voice.

main_definition: The state or measure of being clear , either in appearance , thought or style ; lucidity .
secondary_definitions: The ability to be easily understood.
The ability to think clearly and rationally.
The ability to be easily heard.
